Changelog
=========

0.5 (2009-02-27)
----------------

* Initial Public Release to PyPi and Plone.org
  [erico_andrei]
  
* Very basic i18n support
  [erico_andrei]
  
* Styling and css
  [tamosauskas]

* KSS-enabled document action
  [tamosauskas]

* Filtering of content types
  [erico_andrei]

* Support for a fixed set of bookmarks providers
  [erico_andrei]

* Initial release
